question: 嘆く
sourceMnemonic: When you <kanji>sigh</kanji>, you feel a certain type of emotion. A type that makes you feel sad and causes you <vocabulary>to lament</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>to grieve</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: For the reading, just think about this feeling you're having (this lamenting grieving one). Then, decide you're done with it. <reading>Throw</reading> (<ja><reading>投げ</reading>る</ja>) it out the window. You don't want these feels anymore!
